item.title: Self-Study in April 2019
item.description: How to validate password with regular expression Explains the ‘?=’ character in a regex, to validate conditions. Make it ‘.*’ to ‘contain’, rather than ‘startWith’ Tags: password, validation, look-ahead, regex, regular-expression Id: 2ed5999a-555f-11e9-8bf8-0242ac110005 Read: Tue, 02 Apr 2019 15:51:30 +0000 Unlock honest feedback from your employees with this one word I’ve read this article about asking for advice instead of asking for feedback and how that helped.
